tool_description: An API that returns a Champion object containing a list of abilities, including the champion's passive ability.

api_list.name: Get Champions
api_list.description: Accepts a comma-delimited list of champion names or nicknames and returns a list of champions' full names along with their passive and standard abilities in an object format.

optional_parameters.name: champions
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of champion names or nicknames.

api_list.name: Get Champion Abilities as Text
api_list.description: Accepts a comma-delimited list of champion names or nicknames and returns a text list of champions along with their passive and standard abilities.

required_parameters.name: champion
required_parameters.description: The name or nickname of the champion.
